title: All such buildings where SWH / RTPV are to be installed will have open sunny roof area available for the installation of SWH / RTPV
clause_text: All such buildings where SWH / RTPV are to be installed will have open sunny roof area available for the installation of SWH / RTPV.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
